member.name: T:KLibrary.Labs.Mathematics.FrequencyFilter
member.summary: Represents a filter to suppress the frequency.
member.remarks: Call the method on each frame, then will be recalculated. The return value of the method indicates whether the frame is available.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified options.
member.param: The maximum count of the history items.
The maximum time span of the history.

member.name: M:KLibrary.Labs.Mathematics.FrequencyFilter.CheckLap
member.summary: Records a time stamp, and filters the current lap.
member.returns: if the current lap is available; otherwise, .

member.name: P:KLibrary.Labs.Mathematics.FrequencyFilter.MaxFrequency
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum frequency.

member.name: P:KLibrary.Labs.Mathematics.FrequencyFilter.ArrangedFrequency
member.summary: Gets the arranged frequency. The value is less than or equal to .

member.name: T:KLibrary.Labs.Mathematics.FrequencyMeter
member.summary: Measures the frequency.
member.remarks: Call the method on each frame.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified options.
member.param: The maximum count of the history items.
The maximum time span of the history.

member.summary: Records a time stamp, and measures the frequency.
